allow: Bash(for file in AppSelectionInfoModal.tsx TapoutWarningModal.tsx SettingsBlockWarningModal.tsx RecurrenceInfoModal.tsx DisableTapoutWarningModal.tsx StrictModeWarningModal.tsx BlockSettingsWarningModal.tsx ShieldIconsInfoModal.tsx)

Bash(do sed -i 's/<View style={{ borderColor: ''''#FFFFFF'''' }} className=""w-2 h-3 border-r-2 border-b-2 rotate-45 -mt-0\\.5"" \\/>/<View\\n                    style={{\\n                      width: 8,\\n                      height: 13,\\n                      borderRightWidth: 2.5,\\n                      borderBottomWidth: 2.5,\\n                      borderColor: ''''#FFFFFF'''',\\n                      transform: [{ rotate: ''''45deg'''' }],\\n                      marginTop: -2,\\n                    }}\\n                  \\/>/g' "$file")
